rooms.description: A spacious, minimalist entrance hall with a ramp for wheelchair access. Features floor-to-ceiling windows on the eastern side to capture morning sunlight as per Vastu principles.
Minimalist living area with an open layout, large floor-to-ceiling windows on the east and south to ensure ample natural light, aligned with Vastu.
Integrated dining area adjoining the living room, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the south to complement Vastu guidelines.
Modern minimalist kitchen with barrier-free design for wheelchair access and ample natural light from south-facing floor-to-ceiling windows.
Accessible bathroom designed with grab bars and non-slip flooring to ensure safety; includes a window on the west side for ventilation.
Compact utility space located near kitchen and entrance, designed for storage and appliances with ease of access.
Designated parking space with wheelchair-accessible ramps leading to the main entrance, aligned to the north side as per Vastu norms.
Additional storage room integrated into the ground floor for accessibility and ease of movement.

openings.description: Main entrance door with wheelchair accessible ramp and automatic opening system.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in living room, dining room, kitchen, and utility areas for optimal light.
Wheelchair-accessible ramps connecting entrance hall to other functional spaces.
